About Me

A few things about who I am and what I do...

BIO

A detail-oriented software engineer who pays special attention to writing readable and reusable code. Passionate about developing scalable applications with a concern for UX at each step. In my free time, I enjoy explaining the intricacies of JavaScript/React to future developers and playing soccer (not at the same time). Co-creator of Docketeer, a developer-friendly GUI for Docker.

Docketeer 2020

Software Engineer
  • Implemented Docker functionalities such as run, stop container/image and docker compose up in a friendly UI by utilizing the child process library to execute commands in the terminal while also displaying crucial metrics in detail for each container and for the host machine itself

  • Project accelerated under the tech incubator OSLabs (opensourcelabs.io)

Antioch Investments 2018 - 2020

Chief Operating Officer

  • Analyzed Balance Sheets and P&L reports and reported to stakeholders while overseeing the management of a production facility that co-packed for 10+ wholesale customers and employed 20+ people
